info.title: API ezMESURE
info.description: Use this API to interact with [ezMESURE](https://ezmesure.couperin.org).

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

ForbiddenError.description: Action is forbidden for the authenticated user

indexPrefix.description: The index prefix allocated to the institution

space.description: ID of the space allocated to the institution

role.description: Role associated to the institution. Users with this role are considered members.

uai.description: UAI (Unité Administrative Immatriculée) of the institution

creator.description: Username of the user that declared the institution. Removed once the institution is validated.

validated.description: True when the institution has been validated

indexCount.description: Total number of documents under the institution prefix

logoId.description: Identifier of the institution logo image

updatedAt.description: Datetime of the latest institution update

ezpaarse.description: True if the institution has automated log processing with ezPAARSE

ezmesure.description: True if the institution has automated consultations' deposit into ezMESURE

report.description: True if the institution has an automatic report setup on ezMESURE

errors.description: true if one or more institutions failed to refresh

indexCount.description: total number of documents stored under the index prefix

error.description: an error message if refresh failed

failed.description: Number of consultations that failed to be inserted

errors.description: First error messages from consultations that failed to be inserted

min.description: minimum date covered by the documents

max.description: maximum date covered by the documents

days.description: number of days covered by all documents

institutionId.description: ID of the institution that owns the sushi item

updatedAt.description: Last modification of the sushi item

createdAt.description: Creation date of the sushi item

customerId.description: Whether the sushi endpoint needs a customer ID

requestorId.description: Whether the sushi endpoint needs a requestor ID

apiKey.description: Whether the sushi endpoint needs an API key

example-1.description: This is a fictive sushi endpoint

readonly.description: Whether the member has Kibana write permission

docContact.description: Whether the member is the documentary contact

techContact.description: Whether the member is the technical contact

name.description: The display name of the space

initials.description: The initials shown in the space avatar

color.description: The hexadecimal color code used in the space avatar

disabledFeatures.description: The list of disabled features for the space

imageUrl.description: The data-URL encoded image to display in the space avatar

metadata.description: Metadata to be associated to the role

run_as.description: A list of usernames the owners of this role can impersonate

indices.description: A list of indices permissions entries

names.description: A list of indices to which the permissions in this entry apply

privileges.description: The index level privileges the owners of the role have

kibana.description: Objects that specify the Kibana privileges for the role

sushiId.description: ID of the sushi item related to the task

institutionId.description: ID of the institution related to the task

logs.description: Log messages generated during the process

runningTime.description: How many milliseconds the task has been running

get.description: This route is currently only used to send a ping to the API.
List dashboards

parameters.name: space
parameters.description: Get dashboards with a specific space ID

post.summary: Copy a dashboard from one space to another
post.description: Copy a dashboard from one space to another

dashboard.description: ID of one or more source dashboards

space.description: ID of the space where the dashboard should be imported

indexPattern.description: An index pattern to use instead of the one included in the imported objects

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Override existing objects

get.description: Export a dashboard

parameters.name: space
parameters.description: ID of the space where the dashboard is located

parameters.name: dashboard
parameters.description: ID of one or more dashboards to be exported

post.description: Import a dashboard into a given space

parameters.name: space
parameters.description: The space where the dashboard should be imported

parameters.name: index-pattern
parameters.description: Replace the index-pattern of imported objects

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Override existing objects

get.description: List your hosted files.

delete.summary: Remove one file from your hosted files
delete.description: Remove one file from your hosted files.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The file to be removed.

post.summary: Remove a list of files from your hosted files
post.description: Remove a list of files from your hosted files.

put.description: Initialize an index with an access events oriented mapping

get.description: Get information about an index
Get all institutions

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: if set to false, the authenticated user will not be registered as the institution creator (requires admin permissions)

post.description: Refresh dynamic institution fields (contacts, number of ECs).

get.description: Get an institution by ID. Use 'self' to get the institution of the authenticated user.

put.summary: Change validation state of an institution
put.description: Change validation state of an institution

get.summary: Get Sushi items of an institution
get.description: Get Sushi items of an institution.

post.description: Refresh dynamic fields (contacts, number of ECs) of a specific institution.

get.description: Get the members of an institution. Must be either admin or institution contact.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the institution

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the institution

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the member

put.description: Update the member of an institution

readonly.description: Whether the member has readonly access to the dashboards

docContact.description: Whether the member is the documentary contact

techContact.description: Whether the member is the technical contact

delete.description: Remove a member from an institution

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the institution

get.description: Get the current state of an institution (list spaces, indices, index patterns and roles)
List the existing indices you are allowed to see.

post.description: Insert access events into an index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index where the data should be inserted

parameters.name: Split-Fields
parameters.description: a list of multivalued fields, formatted as __"fieldname(delimitor)"__, and separated with whitespaces. Example: __"ezproxy-groups(+) subjects(,)"__

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: name of the index

delete.description: Remove access events from an index. Defaults to everything if no condition provided.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index where the data should be removed

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Earliest date of the events that should be removed. Can be either a date or datetime in ISO format.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Latest date of the events that should be removed. Can be either a date or datetime in ISO format.

get.summary: Get top metrics for an index
get.description: Get top metrics for an index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index to get tops from.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The time span covered.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the tops.

post.description: Perform search in indices using Elasticsearch Search API.

externalDocs.description: More about Elasticsearch Query DSL and aggregations can be found on

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index to search

200.description: Raw response as returned by Elasticsearch

get.summary: Export all aggregated combinations of the given fields
get.description: Export all aggregated combinations of the given fields

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index that contains the consultations to be aggregated

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The export format

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields that should be aggregated

parameters.name: missing
parameters.description: Include combinations with missing values

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date of the period to be aggregated

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date of the period to be aggregated

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A list of filters in O-Rison format, that should be applied before performing the aggregation

simple.description: Filter a single value by specifying a field and a value. Strings containing spaces should be surrounded by simple quotes `'`.

multiple.description: Filter multiple values by placing them inside `!( )`.

range.description: Filter a numeric range by using `gt`/`gte`/`lt`/`lte` inside `( )`.

negate.description: Negate a filter by placing it inside `(not: )`

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: Delimiter for the CSV output. Use `tab` to get tab-seperated values.

post.summary: Export aggregated COUNTER metrics into another index
post.description: Export aggregated COUNTER metrics into another index

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the index that contains the consultations to be aggregated

destination.description: The index where aggregations should be stored

platform.description: filter aggregations for a specific platform

sessionField.description: The field that holds the session ID, for unique request/investigation counting

get.description: Get general metrics about the data hosted on ezMESURE.
Get the list of validated institutions.
Get the profile associated with the JWT token.
Actually requires a JWT token (typically stored in cookies). This route provides you with a token from the user space.

post.description: Accept terms of service. You should read them first!
Reset Kibana password of the authenticated user.

get.description: List all Kibana roles

parameters.name: reserved
parameters.description: include reserved roles

put.description: Create or update a Kibana role

get.description: Get a role by its name
List spaces
Get all Sushi items
Get the list of known platforms that have sushi endpoints

post.description: Delete multiple Sushi items at once

errors.description: number of items that failed to be imported

conflicts.description: number of items that already exists

created.description: number if items that were successfuly imported

post.description: Import a list of Sushi items

parameters.name: institutionId
parameters.description: ID of the institution that owns the SUSHI items

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: overwrite item if one with the same ID already exists

get.description: Get a Sushi item
Get a specific space

get.summary: List index patterns in a space
get.description: List index patterns in a space

post.description: Create an index pattern in a given space

200.description: Harvest initiated. Returns a task object that can be requested in order to follow the status of the process.

post.description: Initiate a Sushi harvest. Downloads the latest COUNTER report, validate it, and import items into a given index.

target.description: The index where the report should be imported

200.description: The COUNTER report is returned in the body.

202.description: The COUNTER report download has been initiated, or the download is not finised yet. Retry the same link later until the report is available.

get.description: Download a COUNTER report using data from a Sushi item, between two given months. If no period is specified, defaults to the previous month.

parameters.name: beginDate
parameters.description: first month of the report period

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: last month of the report period

get.summary: Get tasks of a Sushi item
get.description: Get tasks related to a Sushi item
Get all tasks

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: filter tasks by status

get.description: Get a specific task
List users. Limited to 10.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: a query for searching

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: a query to change users list limit size

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: a query to retrieve more information, the fields are separated by a comma

get.description: Get a user by his username
